body:
Comment 3 by **r@rcrowley.org**: 
CLOSE as BADDIAGNOSIS

After further further experimentation, it seems Go is incapable of handling any signal
that by default generates a core dump.  This means it's impossible to trap and act on
SIGQUIT plus SIGABRT and some others that most people don't try to trap.

Should I open a different bug to address that?
